short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go ahead, press the gas pedal to the floor and hear the engine roar. Interface yourself with this inspiration on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feeling inspired is an invigorating and energizing experience, as if you're filled with enthusiasm and ready to take on the world. You have a heightened sense of clarity and focus, which allows you to think more creatively. This is the perfect extension for you to feel a sense of inspiration on every new tab. You'll see carefully curated royalty free images which are simple yet inspirational with the world at your fingertips ready to explore. Learn more about us at: https://3bluemedia.com/3b-auto-inspire.html

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the 3B Auto Inspiration extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://3bluemedia.com/terms.html and Privacy Policy at https://3bluemedia.com/3blue-inspiration-privacy-policy.html. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab and it will be provided by Microsoft Bing.
